item.title: Formal Notice sent to FBI Director Christopher A. Wray
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_2204_0800_christopher_wray_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 08, 2024, 22:04 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Christopher A. Wray (FBI Director) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_2204_0800_christopher_wray_Redacted.pdf Dear Director Wray, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.S. Code § 4. Your attention to its contents is imperative and should not be disregarded.
